text: Zaid Ashkanani (born 24 May 1994) is a Kuwaiti racing driver. ==Career== ===Porsche GT3 Cup Challenge Middle East=== Ashkanani began racing in the Porsche GT3 Cup Challenge Middle East in 2012 and already in his first year he managed to get on the podium. In his second season, he became champion having achieved three wins and eight podiums. In the 2014–15 season he lost the championship in the final race. Clemens Schmid became champion that season twelve points in front of Ashkanani. ===GP3 Series=== On February 12, 2015 Campos Racing announced that Ashkanani would join the team for 2015. ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" !
